vsParam:
Yes... What's wrong, Sorel.
Why the panic...

Ah! What's wrong with the doll...
Its body is severely damaged...

Er... I use it in class,
and make it talk and move with magic.
But I guess I practiced magic too hard on it this time...

Is it broken... Show me.
Er... uh... I see. This can be repaired.

Really!? Mmm, Cresson, you are so great!
You are really one of the best tailors in the Academy ♪

He's a professional tailor, you know.
Er, so reliable!

W-wait a minute! I am good at sewing,
but I'm a guard, OK!? Make no mistake about it!

Ha-ha, just kidding.
Please repair it.

Hmm, repairing it is easy...
But, besides the broken parts, many places are worn.

Since I'm repairing it, why don't we do it thoroughly
using some new cloth?

We can count on [px] ♪
Please, can you make some cloth for me using alchemy?

Ho ho, please do Sorel a favor.
Look at her poor doll!
Please make a more durable cloth for the doll, OK!?

Ha-ha, thank you, [px].
Please prepare the cloth for the doll!
